doc:
Thomas Mills Wood https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Thomas_Mills_Wood 0 Thomas Mills Wood (born April 19, 1963) is an American film and television actor. He is usually credited as Tom Wood. He is known for his portrayal of police characters, especially Deputy Marshal Noah Newman in the 1993 film The Fugitive and its spinoff, the 1998 film U.S. Marshals. Thomas_Mills_Wood ( born April_19_,_1963 ) is an_American_film_and_television_actor . He is_usually_credited as Tom_Wood . He is_known for his_portrayal of police_characters , especially Deputy_Marshal_Noah_Newman in the_1993_film The_Fugitive and its_spinoff , the_1998_film_U.S._Marshals .
